extensionDescription.message: Chrome extension for translating, summarizing selected text or link with the assistance of ChatGPT.

promptSelection.message: Summarize this text in no more than 200 words: '''$1'''

promptLink.message: I want you to summarize this news in no more than 200 words. Focus on what the headline refers to and avoid clickbait: '''$1'''

errorTemporal.message: Something went wrong. Please try again in a few minutes: $1

errorReset.message: Something went wrong. Are you connected to chat.openai.com? Try logging out and logging in again.

errorLogin.message: You need to visit chat.openai.com once and check if the connection is secure. Redirecting...

uiInstruction.message: Right-click on the selected text or a link to get a summary or translation
